gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 106, Hawks 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Blazers defeated the Hawks, 106-102.  Anfernee Simons led Portland with 36 points, seven rebounds, and eight assists as Deandre Ayton totaled a season-high 33 points, along with 19 rebounds. Dejounte Murray led Atlanta with 40 points, four rebounds and three assists, as Clint Capela added 13 points and 14 rebounds. The Blazers improve to 19-46 as the Hawks move to 29-36.
